summary: She is green she is strong she is sexy she is ready to kick some dragon asses!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#38761D][size=6][b]Khorah Orc [/b][/size][/color][/font]
by Akhorahil

[size=3]She is green, she is strong, she is sexy,
she is ready to kick some dragon asses,
she is [b]Khorah[/b]![/size]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/1222074-1457300938.jpg[/img]

[size=3]Location:[/size]
Stronghold Narzulbur
(South-east of Windhelm)

[size=3]Description:
[/size][size=3][size=2]She is standalone, so no other mods are required.
[/size][size=2]4 Versions are available, CBBE, CBBE HDT, UNPB, UNPB HDT.[/size][/size]
[size=2]
But HDT version requires:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]
[/size]
[youtube]jcNt9NifDms[/youtube][youtube]VBf_DgXIsfg[/youtube]
Mod Review by [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8B86C6tlovtQIX3IgvdDKQ]Porter Hause
